DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate outcomes following electromagnetic navigation bronchoscopy™ (ENB™) procedures using the superDimension™ navigation system.
DOC.brief_title: NAVIGATE: Clinical Evaluation of superDimension™ Navigation System for Electromagnetic Navigation Bronchoscopy™
DOC.criteria: Subject presents with lung lesion(s) requiring evaluation Subject is willing and able to provide informed consent to participate in the study Subject is candidate for elective ENB™ procedure Subject is over the age of 18 The subject is unable or unwilling to comply with study followup schedule The subject has participated in an investigational drug or device research study within 30 days of enrollment that would interfere with this study Female subjects who are pregnant or nursing as determined by standard site practices
